thread.title: Data Science Automation Opens Branch Office in The United Kingdom to Further Elevate European Customer Service

title: Data Science Automation Opens Branch Office in The United Kingdom to Further Elevate European Customer Service
text:
RSS Navigation Links HOME >> MEDICINE >> TECHNOLOGY Data Science Automation Opens Branch Office in The United Kingdom to Further Elevate European Customer Service ... PITTSBURGH Oct. 13 2015 /-&#1... I am excited to lead this expansion said Chri... The opening of DSA's UK branch office represents our commitment to gr...Data Science Automation's new UK branch office is located at 4 South R... http://feeds.bio-medicine.org/latest-medical-technology Date:10/13/2015 
PITTSBURGH , Oct. 13, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Data Science Automation (DSA), a system integration and automation engineering firm, announced today the opening of a new branch office in the United Kingdom (UK) as the first expansion of DSA's presence in Europe . The decision to open the new office comes in response to the increasing demand for local support of customers in the medical device industry throughout the UK. 
"I am excited to lead this expansion," said Christopher Mullin , Ph.D., DSA's UK Branch Manager. "We have had tremendous success over the last several years in product design, embedded software and control, automated manufacturing, and testing of break-through medical devices and technologies in the UK. This expansion will enable us to grow our European market, promote the DSA brand, and provide the most technically advanced products and services to our international customers." 
"The opening of DSA's UK branch office represents our commitment to growing our business and competing in the UK through clear communication, local technical support and in-country services," said Richard Brueggman , President and CEO of Data Science Automation. "Under Christopher's leadership, DSA is well positioned to better serve our existing international customers, while building a lasting presence and long-term customer relationships within the region." 
Data Science Automation's new UK branch office is located at 4 South Road, Weybridge, Surrey , KT13 9DZ. Contact the office at (724) 350-5128 within the U.S. and +44 (0) 1932 48 99 07 within the UK or csm@dsautomation.com . 
About Data Science Automation Data Science Automation ® (DSA) is a National Instruments ® Certified Alliance Partner, Control System Integrators Association ® (CSIA) Certified Member, a Rockwell Automation Solutions Provider, and MatrikonOPC Systems Integrator. DSA leverages commercial off-the-shelf tools in the design and implementation of custom-engineered solutions that adapt and integrate seamlessly into existing or new systems. The company provides an extensive array of automation engineering, programming, consulting & training services across mechanical, electrical, control, and software engineering disciplines to dramatically improve research, manufacturing, government & business operations. 
To learn more information about DSA visit www.DSAutomation.com
